attributes.action: To allow Ama Sumani the cancer sufferer to be allowed to come back to the United Kingdom for cancer treatment at the University Hospital of Wales in Cardiff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ama Sumani is a cancer sufferer who's days are limited, however with our help by allowing Ama to get access back into the UK her life can be saved meaning the 39 year old mother and widow can have equal rights like everybody else.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
